cross_training_opportunities: Pair programming on security features to upskill the Mid-level developer.
contractor_augmentation_option: Could add a Mid-level NestJS developer to reduce Sprint 1 load by 50%.
cost_optimization: High utilization in Sprint 1 poses a delivery risk. Adding a contractor or extending the timeline is recommended.
future_scaling: Team is at maximum capacity for the current timeline. Scaling is required for any additional scope.
